content:
Public stream created by Ellis D. Cooper. Description:

category-theoretic contributions to the mathematical philosophy of biology

Nathanael Arkor changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

category-theoretic contributions to the mathematical philosophy of biology

  • New description:

A stream to discuss biology from a category-theoretic perspective.
Nathanael Arkor renamed stream MATHEMATICAL PHILOSOPHY OF BIOLOGY to theory: biology.
